p: In addition, chronic wounds of the skin present a painful, unsightly, and unpleasant sensory experience. VOB could be used to stimulate wound hydration, diminishing trauma during dressing changes. Besides, a hydrated wound favors the process of re-epithelialization, granulation, tissue formation, angiogenesis, fibroblast migration, collagen synthesis, and remodeling of injured tissue. Therefore, VOB should be used as a natural synergetic compound to treat skin wounds.
